Name: LEGENO SLAYER
About the game: LEGENO SLAYER becomes a monster slayer and fights countless monsters. By upgrading and combining items that change every time, you endure and endure. In the end, it is an action roguelite game where you become a true monster slayer by hunting the target boss monsters. Experience the fun of LEGENO SLAYER with simple operation! Hunt monsters to get gems! Buy and combine (hidden) items with gems in the shop! Find powerful hidden combination items!
